actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to provide additional funds to the States for carrying out wildlife restoration projects and programs.

summary.text: Title I: Wildlife Restoration Fund - Provides that one-half of the revenues accruing to the Wildlife Restoration Fund for each fiscal year from any tax imposed on firearms shall be apportioned to the States to pay up to seventy-five percent of the cost of a hunter education program, or a public target range program, or both. Provides that unexpended funds available to the State under this Act may be used to carry out the provisions of the Migratory Bird Conservation Act. Title II: Tax on Sale of Component Parts of Firearms Ammunition - Imposes a tax on the component parts of ammunition for firearms.

titles.title: A bill to provide additional funds to the States for carrying out wildlife restoration projects and programs.
